text: Dahi soukohp dono ingoo go Jehu tama daane ni Hanani, guu hana belee heetugi gi di king ga helekai gi mee, “Goe e hagabaubau bolo ma e donu hua di hagamaamaa digau huaidu, gei e huli mai i di baahi digau ala e de hiihai gi Dimaadua? Dau mee dela ne hai dela gaa hidi ai di hagawelewele o Dimaadua ga hagauda adu gi di goe.
